author: wadalliance
title: Auditing African Proposals, By Wada
description: Difficulty in auditing 300+ proposals is impacting our ability to scale. How can we provide regular project updates to voters after funding?

author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: Timelines and Treasury Data
description: Data about Cardano treasury and funds are distributed between multiple sources in multiple formats.

author: swhitenstall
title: Community Governance Oversight
description: Without oversight we risk stagnation and we lack accountability in our governance.

author: cryptoviews
title: P.I.E for Community Dev. Sector
description: To grow auditability, we need to evaluate the implementation result of Catalyst’s funded proposals with systematic framework

author: cryptoviews
title: P.I.E for Gamers-On-Chained
description: It’s hard to evaluate the implementation of funded proposals of "Gamers-On-Chained" without systematic framework

author: cryptoviews
title: P.I.E for Miscellaneous-Challenge
description: It’s very hard to evaluate the implementation of funded proposals in “F8: Miscellaneous-Challenge” without a systematic framework

author: swhitenstall
title: Catalyst Audit Circle
description: Catalyst needs to maintain a governing circle focusing on prioritisation of problems concerning auditing for funded proposals.

author: otaviolima
title: Project Managment & Track Directory
description: How to manage information, track the evolution of thousands of projects funded by Catalyst in an organized, centralized and transparent way.

author: dimitri777
title: Proof of Accomplishment on Catalyst
description: Many projects funded since Fund 1. No one knows re their progress, after funding. Allegations of projects funded but not completed.

author: wolfram.blockchain.labs
title: Wolfram Governance Analytics
description: The growth of Catalyst will make auditing proposals increasingly difficult which may result in limited visibility and failed oversight.

author: defidiscussions
title: Auditing South American Proposals.
description: There are several Catalyst Projects that have been funded and are now underway in South America. We need to be able to track their progress.

author: rhysstoic
title: StakingDAO: DAO & Contract Audit
description: Building a complex DAO requires a vigorous audit to ensure correct functionality and prove it operates in a trust-less manner

author: titan
title: Bayes Spam filter for vCAs
description: Fund 7 had a unmanageable sea of CA reviews rendering vCAs filtering work a heavy burden

author: king.of.diamonds
title: Transparancy in Campaign Financing
description: "Dark Money" in political campaigns throughout the entire world runs in exact opposition to the entire ethos of Decentralization.

author: joey.chessher
title: Auditing & Project Mgmt. via Kanban
description: Auditing Catalyst Proposals and Projects is extremely difficult without Project Management Office Tools and Project Management Training

author: bitmaster.sg
title: cReport - Catalyst analyzer & KPIs
description: Cardano, external users need quality reports, KPIs to have insightful, actionable data of funded proposals and general funds data.

author: callyfromauron
title: WADA Qualitative Audit Pilot
description: Current proposal auditing is weighted towards the quantitative, which prevents WADA capturing a complete picture of its work.

author: lidonation
title: Proposal Translation with Human QA
description: Proposal details & breakdowns are only available in English, excluding non-english speaking communities from participating in Auditing

author: tvauce
title: Renovate Catalyst funding mechanism
description: Through 7 funds, the number of proposals and the size of fund almost double after each fund, burdening to the Catalyst management team.

author: matt.artano
title: Audit Tokens For Catalyst Winners
description: There is no way to track the spendings of each catalyst project in a single platform.

author: cole.vt
title: Project Catalyst Closing Made Easy
description: Divide between funded proposal, and output of team. In 7 funds with 575 projects funded only 43 have submitted a Catalyst closing report.

author: harry.hellyer
title: Growing CA community via Hubs
description: Catalyst needs more CA’s. Cardano Needs awareness and adoption. Community hubs need engagement and to evidence value to local communities
